name: symbols_get_peers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeking_alpha.
Tool description: Query for news, market moving, price quotes, chart, indices, analysis from investors and experts, etc...
API description: Fetches the peer symbols of a given stock symbol using the Seeking Alpha API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to query for peers. Multiple symbols can be queried by separating them with a comma (e.g. 'aapl,tsla').
